dialog.text: Hi there. The seeker  did greeting. The supporter should also do greetings.
Oh, hello. How are you doing?
I'm not feeling weel. The seeker  does not feel well. The supporter should ask the seeker what is wrong.
Oh, I feel bad to hear that. What is the matter?

I lost my job recently and didn't have luck finding a new one. That's really making me stressful. I don't know what to do... The seeker  feels stressful because of lost job. The supporter could suggest the seeker to look for some job resources or have some job interviews practice.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I can understand how stressful that would be.
beam_texts: I'm so sorry to hear that. I can understand how stressful that would be.

dialog.text: I just don't know what to do. The seeker  feels stressful because of lost the job. The supporter could tell the seeker to consult career center or job searching website to get more ideas.
Have you tried looking for some side jobs like cleaning or organizing things? Or could you try working from home a few days a week?
beam_texts: Have you tried looking for some side jobs like cleaning or organizing things? Or could you try working from home a few days a week?

dialog.text: I've tried the working from home thing. It's not really for me. I feel like I need to be in the office to be productive. The seeker  feels stressed because of lost the job. The supporter could suggest the seeker to find some side jobs or working from home.
I understand that. Have you tried reaching out to your friends or family for some support?
beam_texts: I understand that. Have you tried reaching out to your friends or family for some support?

dialog.text: I've talked to my friends a little bit. They are also unhelpful. They think I should just get a job. The seeker  feels stressful because the seeker lost the job and has no idea about the future. The supporter could tell the seeker to focus on the present and try to get some short-term goals. The supporter could also tell the seeker that the supporter is always there for the seeker.
I know that it is hard right now finding a job with this pandemic going on and it will take time but i know you will find a job soon.
beam_texts: I know that it is hard right now finding a job with this pandemic going on and it will take time but i know you will find a job soon.

dialog.text: I know, it's just frustrating. I wish I could just be in the office doing work. The seeker  feels stressful because of losing a job and seeking for a new one. The supporter could tell the seeker some good job-hunting methods. The supporter could also encourage the seeker by telling some successful job-hunting cases.
Have you tried looking online for jobs?
beam_texts: Have you tried looking online for jobs?

dialog.text: I have, but the problem is that I'm also trying to be productive and go to school at the same time. It's really hard to find a balance. The seeker  feels stressful about looking for a job. The supporter could suggest the seeker to focus on one task at a time, and try to find some part-time jobs.
I understand that completely, I am also looking for a job and am also in school..
beam_texts: I understand that completely, I am also looking for a job and am also in school..

dialog.text: I wish you the best of luck in finding a job! I know that it's really hard out there right now. The seeker  feels stressful because the seeker lost the job and has not found a new one yet. The supporter could tell the seeker that the supporter is also looking for a job. The supporter could also give some suggestions to the seeker about job hunting.
Thank you! I know it is hard right now, but we will get through it..
beam_texts: Thank you! I know it is hard right now, but we will get through it..

dialog.text: I sure hope so! I'm trying to stay positive and keep trying. The seeker  feels stressful because of lost the job and hard to find a new one. The supporter could tell the seeker some effective job-hunting methods and encourage the seeker to keep trying.
I know you will find something soon!
beam_texts: I know you will find something soon!

dialog.text: Thank you! I really appreciate it! The seeker  feels stressful because of losing the job and cannot find a new one. The supporter could suggest the seeker to look for some side jobs or working from home. The supporter could also tell the seeker that it is hard to find a job right now due to the pandemic.
You're welcome! I hope you feel better soon and are able to relax..
beam_texts: You're welcome! I hope you feel better soon and are able to relax..

dialog.text: I will! I'll try to do that. The seeker  feels stressed because of looking for a job. The supporter could tell the seeker to take a break and try to look for a job tomorrow. The supporter could also say some positive words to the seeker.
Thank you! I hope it helps..
beam_texts: Thank you! I hope it helps..

dialog.text: It will! I feel so much better! The seeker  feels stressed because of losting job and having difficulty to find a new one. The supporter could tell the seeker to try to find some side jobs or talk to friends or family for support.
You have a great day and stay safe!
beam_texts: You have a great day and stay safe!

dialog.text: You too! Thanks! The seeker  feels stressed because of the lost of job and has a lot of pressure to find a new one. The supporter could tell the seeker to search for some side jobs or working from home to get over the stress.
You're welcome!

Have a great day! The seeker  feels stressed because of lost the job and cannot find a new one. The supporter could tell the seeker to look for some side jobs or reach out to friends or family for support.
You're welcome!

Have a great day! The seeker  feels frustrated, stressed and worried about finding a job. The supporter could tell the seeker to try to look for some side jobs or working from home. The supporter could also suggest the seeker to reach out to friends or family for support.
